name: Deluxe Shop as a Customer for WooCommerce
author: Deluxe Apps

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to quickly switch to customer account at the click of a button.
The Deluxe Shop as a Customer plugin for WooCommerce lets you access the front end
of your store as one of your customer.You’ll be instantly logged out and logged in as your desired customer.
This is handy for testing site/store as customer. You will be able quickly place order for your customer.
This is handy for orders placed by phone and email.

Features

  • Switch to Customer: Instantly switch to any customer account from the users screen.
  • Switch back: Instantly switch back to your orginal account.
  • Place order for your customer.
  • Select which roles are allowed to switch.
  • Block Order Confirmation Email to Customer When Shopping as Customer.

Security

  • Only users with the ability to edit customer account can switch to customer. By default this is only
    Administrators is allowed.
  • You can choose which user roles are allowed to switch. Roles must have edit user and edit shop orders capabilities to switch.
  • Passwords are not (and cannot be) revealed.
  • Uses the cookie authentication system in WordPress when remembering the account(s) you’ve switched from and when switching back.
  • Implements the nonce security system in WordPress, meaning only those who intend to switch users can switch.

Usage

  1. After activating plugin, go to settings page and enable the plugin.
  2. Visit the Users menu in WordPress and you’ll see a Switch To link in the list of action links for each customer.
  3. Click this and you will immediately switch into that user account.
  4. You can switch back to your originating account via the Switch back link on the WordPress toolbar.

short_description: Switch to Customer/Login as Customer, view store/site as customer and shop for/as customer.
